alert.note: Alert for Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN PIKE, CENTRAL HIGHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Hillsboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Greenfield, Leesburg, Marshall, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Highland Holiday, South Salem, Rocky Fork Lake, Samantha, Rainsboro, Paint Creek State Park and Highland County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
